participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: outgoing and optimistic, enjoys unique experiences and has a strong connection to nature.
participant_1.background: my favorite food is papaya. my name is george. i am a bee farmer. i married a super model from italy. i've zero family that i'm close to.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: ambitious and trendy, loves luxury items and has a keen eye for fashion.
participant_2.background: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping.
